CustomField.formula: IF(and(isblank(Expected_Onboarding_Completion_Date_c__c),today()- max_of_opportunity_or_po__c >7,max_of_opportunity_or_po__c>=Date(2021,6,1)),"Sales Handover Pending, if not a genuine case, mail to the sales rep along with the issues","")
CustomField.label: Milestone-Sales Handover
